name: Welcome To Cathouse（欢迎来到猫咪花园）
detailed_description:
Notice：
1. There should be a lot of bugs at this stage. If you find any problems, you can directly send email to me for modification on the same day at the soonest or the next day at the latest.
2. The current English translation is a little bad, I have commissioned a professional translator, and will change to more accurate English in the near future.

Note: a game extension tool is in development.

Including functions:

Create a new role and modify the current role.

Create a story.

If you have any Suggestions about the extension tools, please email me.

About the game

Become the owner of a brothel called cat garden and spend time with your “cats”. This game contains elements of business, romance and RPG, each of which has different talents, upper levels, the ability to learn skills, equip weapons (weapons in a sense) and have independent plots.（‘’cat“ means hooker）

This game contains NTR elements! / / this

About the author

"Butter is a man's romance!

So said a common social animal.

The spare time that USES big half an year made this thing finally, although still have a lot of inadequacy, but also be to achieve the condition that can play.

The game is still in the early experience stage. If you have any bugs or complaints or Suggestions or whatever you want to say during the game, you can email me and reply at any time.

I fix and update the game every day.

Minimum:

  • Graphics:
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
  • Sound Card:
  • Additional Notes:

content_descriptors.notes:
This game contains content that may not be suitable for all ages, or not accessible during work: nudity or sexual innuendo with common adult content.
All content contained in this game is pure fiction and has nothing to do with reality. Please do not imitate any content in the game in reality.
